structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The chief and members of the fire department, while on duty at a fire, shall be exempt from arrest on civil process and from service with subpoenas from civil courts.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2896a-14.
